resources.string: Explore the world of classical music
Handpicked for all occasions - by you
Main screen with 3 equally weighted RelativeLayout. Click any option to launch another activity.
Discover section where user can browse through composers. Fast scroll view will fetch data from a database and display it with an ArrayAdapter.
Discover section where user can browse through performers. Fast scroll view will fetch data from a database and display it with an ArrayAdapter.
Discover section where user can browse through eras by scrolling cards in a timeline order. Cards will display in an ArrayList.

Subcribing section for advanced features. Payment is done by integrating PayPal Mobile Payment Libraries (MPL in GitHub repository). Favorite songs of the user are listed in an ArrayList, available for shuffle play, or direct search. The user can easily make a playlist and add to Selections section.
Custom-made playlist arranged like tiles in a GridLayout. User can add pre-set photos to each tile, fitting them to mood/purpose.
